Home_welcome: Ski Tim training: energy and power in every step!
about_1line: Hi! I’m Tim - a personal trainer in cross-country skiing, workout and strength training
about_2line: 3rd place of La Diagonela 2024 among amateurs. Top 10 in five marathons in the Euroloppet and Visma Ski Classics Challengers series
about_4line: 30 cross country ski marathons across Europe
about_3line: More than 20 years of cross country ski experience: comprehensive training for competitions, keeping fit and remote training plans
about_description1: Exciting training in amazing places in Switzerland in German, English or Russian languages.
about_description2: Choose what you like: cross-country skiing, hiking, strength training, trail running, and I will bring you a Swiss-quality training, good mood, energy and perfect results, regardless of the season and weather.
price_description_block1: I am glad to introduce you to the world of sport in our first trial training session. You will get to know the basic principles of the training process, learn more about the periodization and specialization. Location - Thun, Bern by arrangement. Consultation in messengers for free!
price_description_block2: Technical, strength, interval or circuit training for 60-90 minutes. Support and assistance throughout the training session. At the end of the session, I will give you recommendations on next steps to maximize your results. It's flexible - you can choose the time and location of your training session. Location - Thun, Bern by arrangement. Consultation in messengers for free!
price_description_block3: Want to enjoy some time together with your family? This option is perfect for those who love family activities. An exciting training program bring fun and memorable moments. The training program is designed regardless of your age and physical conditions (2 adults, 2 children).
price_description_block4: You will have access to a weekly training plan that includes a variety of physical activities based on your goals. After each training session, I can give you feedback via chat. Each month, we organise a 30 minute online meeting where we can discuss the next steps in the training process. Location - all of Switzerland.
price_description_block5: Come with me on an adventure through the Swiss Alps. A few hours route gives you a chance to enjoy breathtaking views of mountains, valleys and villages. For advanced athletes, there is the option of a long-run training session. I will choose the ideal track according to your wishes and support you along the route. Location - all of Switzerland.
price_description_block6: For real enthusiasts, athletes and lovers of a healthy lifestyle. After this set of training, you will have a huge perspective on your athletic potential. You will gain new comprehensive knowledge of the training process.
